name: Possible CD
template: SUM("BSEG"."SKFBT_CONVERTED"* "BSEG"."ZBD1P")/100.0

name: CD Netto
template: "BSEG"."SKNTO_CONVERTED"

name: CT Total
template: MEDIAN(CALC_THROUGHPUT(CASE_START TO CASE_END, REMAP_TIMESTAMPS("_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", DAYS)))

name: Order Message Type
template: "NAST"."NACHA_TEXT"

name: Count Items
template: COUNT_TABLE("EKPO")

name: Count Header
template: COUNT_TABLE("EKKO")

name: Manual Price Change Rate
template:
AVG(CASE WHEN PU_COUNT(EKPO, "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Change Price' AND "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" NOT IN (<%=automatic_users%>))>=1
THEN 1.0
ELSE 0.0
END)

description: Percentage of cases with matching quantity in purchase order, goods receipt and invoice.
name: Quantity Match Ratio
template:
(1.0*COUNT(DISTINCT 
    CASE 
    WHEN "EKPO"."MENGE" = 0.0 THEN NULL
        WHEN
        
    --Order Quantity = GR Quantity
    (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S'))) >= (-1*((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") *(<%=tolerance_high_quantity%>/100.00)))) 
    AND (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S'))) <= (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE")*(<%=tolerance_low_quantity%>/100.00))))
    -- Order Quantity = IR Quantity
    AND (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) >= (-1*((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") *(<%=tolerance_high_quantity%>/100.00)))) 
    AND (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) <= (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE")*(<%=tolerance_low_quantity%>/100.00))))
   -- IR Quantity = GR Quantity (with tolerance of Order Quantity)
  AND (((1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE")) - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S'))) >= (-1*((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") *(<%=tolerance_high_quantity%>/100.00)))) 
    AND (((1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE")) - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S'))) <= (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE")*(<%=tolerance_low_quantity%>/100.00))))

            THEN "EKPO"."MANDT"||"EKPO"."EBELN"||"EKPO"."EBELP" 
        ELSE NULL 
    END)
/COUNT_TABLE("EKPO"))

name: MB Indicator
template:
CASE WHEN
     PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_MINUTE("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB1 %>) <= ROUND_MINUTE("EKKO"."AEDAT") 
         AND <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 1 
          THEN 'affected'
     WHEN PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_DAY("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB1 %>) <= ROUND_DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT")
         AND <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 2
          THEN 'affected'
     WHEN <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 3
          AND PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_DAY("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB1 %>) <= ROUND_DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT") OR
          <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 3
          AND PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_MINUTE("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB2 %>) <= ROUND_MINUTE("EKKO"."AEDAT")
          THEN 'affected'
    ELSE 'not affected'
    END

name: Message Type Classification
template:
CASE
  WHEN ISNULL(PU_FIRST("EKKO","NAST"."NACHA")) = 1 THEN 'No order message'
  WHEN PU_FIRST("EKKO","NAST"."NACHA", "NAST"."KSCHL" = 'NEU') IN (<%=EDI%>) THEN 'Electronic order message'
  WHEN PU_FIRST("EKKO","NAST"."NACHA", "NAST"."KSCHL" = 'NEU') IN (<%=Print%>) THEN 'Print order message'
  WHEN PU_FIRST("EKKO","NAST"."NACHA", "NAST"."KSCHL" = 'NEU') IN (<%=Mail%>) THEN 'Mail order message'
  ELSE 'Other'
END

name: First Time Right Ratio
template: SUM(CASE WHEN PU_COUNT_DISTINCT("EKPO", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES".ACTIVITY_<%=language%> IN (<%=rework_activities%>)) > 0 THEN 0.0 ELSE 1.0 END) / COUNT_TABLE("EKPO")

name: Paper Rate
template:
AVG(
CASE WHEN "NAST"."NACHA" IN (<%=Print%>) AND ISNULL("NAST"."DATVR")=0 THEN 1.0
    WHEN ISNULL(NAST.DATVR)=1 THEN NULL
    WHEN ISNULL("NAST"."UHRVR")=1 THEN NULL
    ELSE 0.0 END)

name: Fax Rate
template:
AVG(
CASE WHEN "NAST"."NACHA" IN (<%=Fax%>) AND ISNULL("NAST"."DATVR")=0 THEN 1.0
    WHEN ISNULL(NAST.DATVR)=1 THEN NULL
    WHEN ISNULL("NAST"."UHRVR")=1 THEN NULL
    ELSE 0.0 END)

name: Cycle Time Median EDI
template:
MEDIAN(REMAP_TIMESTAMPS(PU_LAST("EKPO", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = <%=To_EDI%>), days) - 
REMAP_TIMESTAMPS(PU_FIRST("EKPO", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = <%=From_EDI%>), days))

name: Count Amount
template: SUM("EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED")

name: Automation_Rate_Case_Level
template:
AVG(CASE WHEN ISNULL("_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 1 THEN NULL
ELSE PU_COUNT(EKPO, "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" IN (<%=automatic_users%>))/
(PU_COUNT(EKPO, "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN")*1.0)END)

name: Cycle Time Total
template: MEDIAN(REMAP_TIMESTAMPS(PU_LAST("EKPO", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME"), DAYS) - REMAP_TIMESTAMPS(PU_FIRST("EKPO", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME"), DAYS))

name: Too early
template:
100* AVG(
CASE 
        -- no reqeusted due date (not part of the analysis)
        WHEN ISNULL(<%= Due_Date %>) = 1 THEN NULL 
        -- requested due date in the future 
        WHEN ISNULL(<%= GR_VARIABLE %>) = 1 AND DAYS_BETWEEN(TODAY(),<%= Due_Date %>) >= 0 THEN NULL 
        -- no goods receipt and requested due date more than the tolerance in the past, seen as 'overdue' 
        WHEN ISNULL(<%= GR_VARIABLE %>) = 1 AND DAYS_BETWEEN(TODAY(),<%= Due_Date %>) < (-1.0 * <%= OTD_upper %>) THEN 0.0 
        -- no goods receipt and requested due date in the past, but still in the tolerance buffer
        WHEN ISNULL(<%= GR_VARIABLE %>) = 1 THEN NULL
        -- delivery too early
        WHEN DAYS_BETWEEN(<%= Due_Date %>, <%= GR_VARIABLE %>) < (-1.0 * <%= OTD_lower %>)
        THEN 1.0 
        -- else: delivery on-time or too late
        ELSE 0.0 
    END
)

name: Telex
template:
AVG(
CASE WHEN "NAST"."NACHA" IN (<%=Telex%>) AND ISNULL("NAST"."DATVR")=0 THEN 1.0
    WHEN ISNULL(NAST.DATVR)=1 THEN NULL
    WHEN ISNULL("NAST"."UHRVR")=1 THEN NULL
    ELSE 0.0 END)

description: Percentage of cases with matching quantity in purchase order, goods receipt and invoice and matching price per unit in purchase order and invoice
name: Full Match Ratio
template:
(1.0*COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
-- No quantity match if order quantity is 0
WHEN "EKPO"."MENGE" = 0.0 THEN NULL
WHEN
-- Quantity match

    --Order Quantity = GR Quantity
    (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S'))) >= (-1*((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") *(<%=tolerance_high_quantity%>/100.00)))) 
    AND (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S'))) <= (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE")*(<%=tolerance_low_quantity%>/100.00))))
    -- Order Quantity = IR Quantity
    AND (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) >= (-1*((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") *(<%=tolerance_high_quantity%>/100.00)))) 
    AND (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) <= (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE")*(<%=tolerance_low_quantity%>/100.00))))
  -- IR Quantity = GR Quantity (with tolerance of Order Quanitty)
  AND (((1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE")) - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S'))) >= (-1*((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") *(<%=tolerance_high_quantity%>/100.00)))) 
    AND (((1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE")) - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S'))) <= (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE")*(<%=tolerance_low_quantity%>/100.00))))

-- Value match 
--(Price per Unit (PO) - Price per Unit (Invoice) >= -price increase tolerance (diff is negative when price increases) 
--and Price per Unit (PO) - Price per Unit (Invoice) <= price decrease tolerance (diff is positive when price decreases))
    AND(((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE) - (PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."WRBTR")/PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) >= (-1*((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE)*(<%=tolerance_high_price%>/100.00)))) 
    AND (((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE) - (PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."WRBTR")/PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) <= (((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE)*(<%=tolerance_low_price%>/100.00))))
    
    THEN "EKPO"."MANDT"||"EKPO"."EBELN"||"EKPO"."EBELP" 
    ELSE NULL 

END)/COUNT_TABLE("EKPO"))

name: Mail Rate
template:
AVG(
CASE WHEN "NAST"."NACHA" IN (<%=Mail%>) AND ISNULL("NAST"."DATVR")=0 THEN 1.0
    WHEN ISNULL(NAST.DATVR)=1 THEN NULL
    WHEN ISNULL("NAST"."UHRVR")=1 THEN NULL
    ELSE 0.0 END)

name: Free Text Order Value
template:
SUM(
CASE 
    WHEN COALESCE("EKPO"."MATNR",'') = '' 
    THEN 
        "EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED" 
    ELSE
        0.0 
END)

name: Touchless Orders
template:
AVG(CASE
    WHEN (PU_COUNT("EKPO","_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY","_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" 
    IN (<%= automatic_users %>) AND "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" 
    IN (<%=automated_activities%>)) 
	 = PU_COUNT("EKPO","_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN"
	 IN (<%=automated_activities%>)))
    THEN 1.0
    ELSE 0.0
END)

name: Type of Price Change
template:
CASE WHEN PU_AVG("EKPO", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."CHANGED_TO_FLOAT"/"_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."CHANGED_FROM_FLOAT", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Change Price') > 1 
AND PU_COUNT("EKPO", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN","_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Change Price') > 0 THEN 'Increase in Price'
WHEN PU_AVG("EKPO", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."CHANGED_TO_FLOAT"/"_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."CHANGED_FROM_FLOAT", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Change Price') <= 1
AND PU_COUNT("EKPO", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN","_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Change Price') > 0 THEN 'Decrease in Price'
ELSE '' END

name: MB PO Items Count
template:
SUM(CASE WHEN
     PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_MINUTE("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB1 %>) <= ROUND_MINUTE("EKKO"."AEDAT") 
         AND <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 1 
          THEN 1.00
          
    WHEN PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_DAY("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB1 %>) <= ROUND_DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT")
         AND <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 2
         THEN 1.00
    
    WHEN <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 3
         AND PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_DAY("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB1 %>) <= ROUND_DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT") OR
         <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 3 AND
         PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_MINUTE("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB2 %>) <= ROUND_MINUTE("EKKO"."AEDAT")
         THEN 1.00
    ELSE 0.00
END)

name: Free Text Orders
template:
SUM(
CASE 
    WHEN COALESCE("EKPO"."MATNR",'') = '' 
    THEN 
        1.0 
    ELSE 
        0.0 
END)

name: Cycle Time Sub
template: <%=agg%>(CALC_THROUGHPUT(<%=from_occ%>_OCCURRENCE[<%=From%>] TO <%=to_occ%>_OCCURRENCE[<%=To%>], REMAP_TIMESTAMPS("_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", <%=unit%>)))

name: MB affected Value
template:
SUM(CASE WHEN
     PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_MINUTE("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB1 %>) <= ROUND_MINUTE("EKKO"."AEDAT") 
         AND <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 1 
          THEN "EKPO"."NETWR"
          
    WHEN PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_DAY("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB1 %>) <= ROUND_DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT")
         AND <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 2
         THEN "EKPO"."NETWR"
    
    WHEN <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 3
         AND PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_DAY("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB1 %>) <= ROUND_DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT") OR 
         <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 3 
         AND PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_MINUTE("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB2 %>) <= ROUND_MINUTE("EKKO"."AEDAT")
         THEN "EKPO"."NETWR"
    ELSE 0.00
END)

description: Classification of cases based on price and quantity match.
name: Classification
template:
CASE
-- No quantity match if order quantity is 0
WHEN "EKPO"."MENGE" = 0.0 THEN 'No order quantity'
WHEN-- Quantity match

    --Order Quantity = GR Quantity
    (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S'))) >= (-1*((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") *(<%=tolerance_high_quantity%>/100.00)))) 
    AND (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S'))) <= (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE")*(<%=tolerance_low_quantity%>/100.00))))
    -- Order Quantity = IR Quantity
    AND (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) >= (-1*((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") *(<%=tolerance_high_quantity%>/100.00)))) 
    AND (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) <= (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE")*(<%=tolerance_low_quantity%>/100.00))))
    -- IR Quantity = GR Quantity (with tolerance of Order Quanitty)
  AND (((1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE")) - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S'))) >= (-1*((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") *(<%=tolerance_high_quantity%>/100.00)))) 
    AND (((1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE")) - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S'))) <= (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE")*(<%=tolerance_low_quantity%>/100.00))))

-- Value match 
--(Price per Unit (PO) - Price per Unit (Invoice) >= -price increase tolerance (diff is negative when price increases) 
--and Price per Unit (PO) - Price per Unit (Invoice) <= price decrease tolerance (diff is positive when price decreases))
    AND(((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE) - (PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."WRBTR")/PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) >= (-1*((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE)*(<%=tolerance_high_price%>/100.00)))) 
    AND (((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE) - (PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."WRBTR")/PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) <= (((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE)*(<%=tolerance_low_price%>/100.00))))
THEN 'Full Match'
    WHEN(    --Order Quantity = GR Quantity
    (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S'))) >= (-1*((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") *(<%=tolerance_high_quantity%>/100.00)))) 
    AND (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S'))) <= (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE")*(<%=tolerance_low_quantity%>/100.00))))
    -- Order Quantity = IR Quantity
    AND (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) >= (-1*((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") *(<%=tolerance_high_quantity%>/100.00)))) 
    AND (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) <= (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE")*(<%=tolerance_low_quantity%>/100.00))))
    -- GR Quantity = IR Quantity (with tolerance of Order Quanitty)
    AND (((1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S')) - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) >= (-1*((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE") *(<%=tolerance_high_quantity%>/100.00)))) 
    AND (((1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","EKBE"."MENGE","EKBE"."VGABE"='1' AND "EKBE"."SHKZG" = 'S')) - (1.0*PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) <= (((1.0*"EKPO"."MENGE")*(<%=tolerance_low_quantity%>/100.00))))
)
    THEN 'Only Quantity Match'
    WHEN
        ((((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE) - (PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."WRBTR")/PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) >= (-1*((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE)*(<%=tolerance_high_price%>/100.00)))) AND
        (((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE) - (PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."WRBTR")/PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) <= (((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE)*(<%=tolerance_low_price%>/100.00)))))
    THEN 'Only Price Match'
    ELSE 'No Match'
END

name: Automation Rate
template:
AVG(CASE WHEN ISNULL("_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE") = 1 THEN NULL 
WHEN "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" IN(<%=automatic_users%>) THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)

name: EDI Rate
template:
AVG(
CASE WHEN "NAST"."NACHA" IN (<%=EDI%>) AND ISNULL("NAST"."DATVR")=0 THEN 1.0
    WHEN ISNULL(NAST.DATVR)=1 THEN NULL
    WHEN ISNULL("NAST"."UHRVR")=1 THEN NULL
    ELSE 0.0 END)

name: Price Change Rate
template:
COUNT(
DISTINCT 
CASE 
WHEN PU_COUNT(EKPO,"_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Change Price') >0 AND ISNULL("_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."CHANGE_NUMBER") = 0
THEN EKPO.MANDT || EKPO.EBELN || EKPO.EBELP 
ELSE NULL 
END)*1.0
/COUNT(DISTINCT EKPO.MANDT || EKPO.EBELN || EKPO.EBELP)

name: External Send
template:
AVG(
CASE WHEN "NAST"."NACHA" IN (<%=External_Send%>) AND ISNULL("NAST"."DATVR")=0 THEN 1.0
    WHEN ISNULL(NAST.DATVR)=1 THEN NULL
    WHEN ISNULL("NAST"."UHRVR")=1 THEN NULL
    ELSE 0.0 END)

name: MB Ratio
template:
SUM(CASE WHEN
     PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_MINUTE("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB1 %>) <= ROUND_MINUTE("EKKO"."AEDAT") 
         AND <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 1 
          THEN 1.00
          
    WHEN PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_DAY("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB1 %>) <= ROUND_DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT")
         AND <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 2
         THEN 1.00
    
    WHEN <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 3
         AND PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_DAY("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB1 %>) <= ROUND_DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT") OR 
         <%= MBTypeSelector %> = 3
         AND PU_FIRST("EKPO",ROUND_MINUTE("EKBE"."BUDAT"),<%= TypeOfMB2 %>) <= ROUND_MINUTE("EKKO"."AEDAT")
         THEN 1.00
    ELSE 0.00
END) / COUNT_TABLE("EKPO")

name: Too late
template:
100* AVG(
CASE 
        -- no reqeusted due date (not part of the analysis)
        WHEN ISNULL(<%= Due_Date %>) = 1 THEN NULL 
        -- requested due date in the future 
        WHEN ISNULL(<%= GR_VARIABLE %>) = 1 AND DAYS_BETWEEN(TODAY(),<%= Due_Date %>) >= 0 THEN NULL 
        -- no goods receipt and requested due date more than the tolerance in the past, seen as 'overdue' 
        WHEN ISNULL(<%= GR_VARIABLE %>) = 1 AND DAYS_BETWEEN(TODAY(),<%= Due_Date %>) < (-1.0 * <%= OTD_upper %>) THEN 0.0
        -- no goods receipt and requested due date in the past, but still in the tolerance buffer
        WHEN ISNULL(<%= GR_VARIABLE %>) = 1 THEN NULL
        -- delivery too early
        WHEN DAYS_BETWEEN(<%= Due_Date %>, <%= GR_VARIABLE %>) > <%= OTD_upper %>
        THEN 1.0 
        -- else: delivery on-time or too early
        ELSE 0.0 
    END
)

name: Rework_Classification
template:
CASE WHEN PU_COUNT_DISTINCT("EKPO", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY", 
"_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES".ACTIVITY_<%=language%> IN (<%=rework_activities%>)) > 0 THEN 'With rework'
ELSE 'First-Time-Right' END

description: Percentage of cases with matching price per unit in purchase order and invoice.
name: Price Match Ratio
template:
(1.0*COUNT(DISTINCT
    CASE 
        WHEN 
        ((((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE) - (PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."WRBTR")/PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) >= (-1*((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE)*(<%=tolerance_high_price%>/100.00)))) AND
        (((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE) - (PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."WRBTR")/PU_SUM("EKPO","RSEG"."MENGE"))) <= (((<%=netwr%>/EKPO.MENGE)*(<%=tolerance_low_price%>/100.00)))))
        THEN "EKPO"."MANDT"||"EKPO"."EBELN"||"EKPO"."EBELP"
        ELSE NULL
    END)
/COUNT_TABLE("EKPO"))

description: the absolute number of purchase orders that are created and recorded as received by the same user
name: SOD Count
template:
sum(
    case
    when PU_first(EKPO,"_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."USER_NAME", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES".ACTIVITY_<%=language%> = '<%=FromSOD%>' AND "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" NOT IN (<%=automatic_users%>)) = PU_first(EKPO,"_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."USER_NAME", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES".ACTIVITY_<%=language%> = '<%=ToSOD%>')
        then 1.0
    else 0.0
end
)

description: --calculates the ratio of purchase orders where the user who does one activity also does another one
name: SOD Ratio
template:
avg(
    case
    when PU_first(EKPO,"_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."USER_NAME", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES".ACTIVITY_<%=language%> = '<%=FromSOD%>'  AND "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."USER_TYPE" NOT IN (<%=automatic_users%>)) = PU_first(EKPO,"_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."USER_NAME", "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES".ACTIVITY_<%=language%> = '<%=ToSOD%>') 
        then 1.0
    else 0.0
end
) * 100

name: Due Date Classification
template:
CASE
   WHEN ISNULL(<%= GR_VARIABLE %>) = 1 AND (DATEDIFF(dd,TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= Due_Date %>, 'YYYYMMDD' ), TO_TIMESTAMP(<%=Days_back%>, 'DD-MM-YYYY')))  >= 0 THEN 'No Goods Receipt and Future Due Date'
   WHEN ISNULL(<%= GR_VARIABLE %>) = 1 AND (DATEDIFF(dd,TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= Due_Date %>, 'YYYYMMDD' ), TO_TIMESTAMP(<%=Days_back%>, 'DD-MM-YYYY')))  < (-1.0 * <%= OTD_upper %>) THEN 'No Goods Receipt and Due Date passed (Overdue)'
   WHEN ISNULL(<%= GR_VARIABLE %>) = 1 AND (DATEDIFF(dd,TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= Due_Date %>, 'YYYYMMDD' ), TO_TIMESTAMP(<%=Days_back%>, 'DD-MM-YYYY'))) < 0 THEN 'No Goods Receipt, but still in due date tolerance buffer' 
   WHEN DAYS_BETWEEN(TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= Due_Date %>, 'YYYYMMDD' ), TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= GR_VARIABLE %>, 'YYYYMMDD' )) <= <%= OTD_upper %> 
    AND DAYS_BETWEEN(TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= Due_Date %>, 'YYYYMMDD' ), TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= GR_VARIABLE %>, 'YYYYMMDD' )) >= (-1.0 * <%= OTD_lower %>) 
        THEN 'Delivery on time'
   WHEN DAYS_BETWEEN(TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= Due_Date %>, 'YYYYMMDD' ), TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= GR_VARIABLE %>, 'YYYYMMDD' )) > <%= OTD_upper %> THEN 'Delivery too late'
   WHEN DAYS_BETWEEN(TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= Due_Date %>, 'YYYYMMDD' ), TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= GR_VARIABLE %>, 'YYYYMMDD' )) < (-1.0 * <%= OTD_lower %>) THEN 'Delivery too early'
   WHEN ISNULL(<%= Due_Date%>) = 1 AND ISNULL(<%= GR_VARIABLE %>) = 1 THEN 'No Goods Receipt and No On-Time Delivery Date'
   WHEN ISNULL(<%= Due_Date%>) = 1 THEN 'Goods Receipt but No On-Time Delivery Date'
   ELSE 'Other'
END

name: OTD Rate
template:
AVG(CASE WHEN (CASE
   WHEN ISNULL(<%= GR_VARIABLE %>) = 1 AND (DATEDIFF(dd,TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= Due_Date %>, 'YYYYMMDD' ), TO_TIMESTAMP(<%=Days_back%>, 'DD-MM-YYYY')))  >= 0 THEN 'No Goods Receipt and Future Due Date'
   WHEN ISNULL(<%= GR_VARIABLE %>) = 1 AND (DATEDIFF(dd,TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= Due_Date %>, 'YYYYMMDD' ), TO_TIMESTAMP(<%=Days_back%>, 'DD-MM-YYYY')))  < (-1.0 * <%= OTD_upper %>) THEN 'No Goods Receipt and Due Date passed (Overdue)'
   WHEN ISNULL(<%= GR_VARIABLE %>) = 1 AND (DATEDIFF(dd,TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= Due_Date %>, 'YYYYMMDD' ), TO_TIMESTAMP(<%=Days_back%>, 'DD-MM-YYYY'))) < 0 THEN 'No Goods Receipt, but still in due date tolerance buffer' 
   WHEN DAYS_BETWEEN(TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= Due_Date %>, 'YYYYMMDD' ), TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= GR_VARIABLE %>, 'YYYYMMDD' )) <= <%= OTD_upper %> 
    AND DAYS_BETWEEN(TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= Due_Date %>, 'YYYYMMDD' ), TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= GR_VARIABLE %>, 'YYYYMMDD' )) >= (-1.0 * <%= OTD_lower %>) 
        THEN 'Delivery on time'
   WHEN DAYS_BETWEEN(TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= Due_Date %>, 'YYYYMMDD' ), TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= GR_VARIABLE %>, 'YYYYMMDD' )) > <%= OTD_upper %> THEN 'Delivery too late'
   WHEN DAYS_BETWEEN(TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= Due_Date %>, 'YYYYMMDD' ), TO_TIMESTAMP ( <%= GR_VARIABLE %>, 'YYYYMMDD' )) < (-1.0 * <%= OTD_lower %>) THEN 'Delivery too early'
   WHEN ISNULL(<%= Due_Date%>) = 1 AND ISNULL(<%= GR_VARIABLE %>) = 1 THEN 'No Goods Receipt and No On-Time Delivery Date'
   WHEN ISNULL(<%= Due_Date%>) = 1 THEN 'Goods Receipt but No On-Time Delivery Date'
   ELSE 'Other'
END) = 'Delivery on time'
THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)

name: Free Text Order Rate
template:
100*(SUM(
    CASE 
        WHEN COALESCE("EKPO"."MATNR",'') = ''
        -- ISNULL("EKPO"."MATNR") = 1 
        THEN
            1.0 
        ELSE 
            0.0 
    END)
/COUNT_TABLE("EKPO"))

name: Free Text Orders Indicator
template:
CASE 
    WHEN COALESCE("EKPO"."MATNR",'') = ''
    THEN
        'Free-Text Order' 
    ELSE
        'No Free-Text Order' 
END

name: MAX CD
template: "BSEG"."SKFBT_CONVERTED"* "BSEG"."ZBD1P"/100.0
